Label: Biomass from 2006 to 2011
Notes: This is a response variable = g/cm averaged over the last 5 years of full growth (2007-2011 inclusively)

Label: Percentage Maximum of Biomass5 Per species
Notes: This is a response variable

Label: Branch Dry Mass
Notes: means nothing

Label: Leaf Thickness
Notes: too correlated with LMA, so I excluded it manually - this one is of ecophysiological interest though, so we might want to consider including it back in.

Label: Leaf Density
Notes: dimensionally related to LMA and leaf thickness, so I excluded it manually

Label: Ratio of Carbon to Nitrogen
Notes: dimensionally repetitive with LCC and LNC

Label: Ratio of Carbon to Phosphorus
Notes: dimensionally repetitite with LCC and LPC

Label: Ratio of Nitrogen to Phosphorus
Notes: dimensionally repetitive with LNC and LPC

Label: Conductivity per Lumen Area
Notes: too correlated with Ks, so I excluded it manually

Label: Conductivity per total leaf area on branch
Notes: too correlated with Ktwig, so I excluded it manually

Label: 2011 Biomass (g/cm)
Notes: too correlated with Bio5 - We could try it as an alternate response variable to Biomass 5, to see if the full model fits better. Since many traits are plastic, maybe they only predict growth of the last year?

Label: Percentage Maximum of Biomass 1 Per Species
Notes: Too correlated with X.max.Bio5 so I excluded it manually

Label: Total Transmitted Light
Notes: too corelated with % Canopy opening so I excluded it manually

Label: Modulus of Elasticity for Stem
Notes: Modulus of elasticity is also called "Young's Modulus"

Label: Branching Distance
Notes: Average distance between bifurcations in a branch

Label: Leaf Area
Notes: Average area of a single leaf

Label: Delta 15N
Notes: In leaves - nitrogen isotope ratio

Label: Thickness to Span Ratio
Notes: reflects vessel resistance to implosion

Label: Huber Value
Notes: Ratio of Total leaf area on a branch to the cross-sectional area of the branch

Label: Delta13C
Notes: In leaves - carbon isotope ratio - reflects Water Use Efficiency

Label: Tree Age
Notes: Tree-level Covariates

Label: Symmetric Competition
Notes: These are environmental variables

Label: Mean Temperature
Notes: This is the mean temp between June2012&Dec2014 (when ibuttons were in the field)

Label: Maximum Species Height based on Literature
Notes: species-level variable

Label: Species Shade Tolerance
Notes: species-level variable

Label: Species Drought Tolerance
Notes: species-level variable

Label: Species WaterLogging Tolerance
Notes: species-level variable

Label: Species
Notes: Tree-level Covariates

Label: Site
Notes: Tree-level Covariates

Label: Tree Height
Notes: Tree-level Covariates

Label: Branch Height
Notes: This covariate is the height at which my branch sample was taken from the tree. Not really a trait. Used to see if it affected d13C values because some papers say it will. But it didn't in my data

Label: Twig Branching Angle
Notes: Tree-level Covariates

Label: Height to Diameter-at-breast-height ratio
Notes: These are plant traits

Label: Modulus of Elasticity for Twigs
Notes: We can ignore that one. It Modulus of elasticity doesn't make much sense in the context of a branch

Label: Twig Diameter
Notes: Note that I use 'twig' and 'branch' interchangeably

Label: Julian Date in 2011
Notes: This covariate is the date at which the leaf samples were collected - used to correct for phenological effects on traits
